vsParam:
Everybody is smiling... [px].
This is kind of scary, right?

However, it also shows how much
we want to hear about the "Love Story"...

You too... It means that everyone
looks forward to hearing about the "Love Story"...

See? I got it right.
Give up, Verbena.

Humph— Humph—!
Alright, I get it!

Hmm, hmm... I... I don't know if I can call it love.
I had a partner a long time ago.
Yes. A partner in the piracy business...

I was born rich,
lived in a big mansion and had a life full of restrictions.

And then someone taught me about the vastness of the ocean...
And the charm of various treasures...

This someone was my partner, who was also my
childhood sweetheart.

And? I don't know how to tell you... I came to the ocean
with him, and had many adventures together as pirates...

During our journey, I died in an accident,
and couldn't finish our dream with him. That's it.

See?
This is my "Love Story". It's quite simple.

We had never admitted to each other how we really felt...
It's just an ordinary scene of youth.

The thing I asked [px] to make
was worn by him as a boy.

When I was little, I often sneaked out of the mansion,
and then ran in the field with him.

The time I spent with him...
is a great treasure that nothing can replace in my heart.
Sing it out then. Sing the "Love Song"!

The "Love Song"!
You are still thinking about that man, right?

Yeah, Verbena!
If you still miss him... It will work!

That's right. Get it all out!
Don't keep everything inside!
... I'm not very clear. Is that so?
Yeah, it must be the right thing to do ♪

Although this is a turbid Love Song
that has faded into oblivion in hundreds of years—

I still wish that you could hear it.
With that wish in mind, I shall start singing.
—"The Song of the Blue Sea, the Song of Love"
